CHAT.comment: at the start of the session May and her mother are sitting on the floor , her father is sitting on the couch.

u.a: May touches Roy's shoes once more , May stands by her mother's knee .
May turns to look at CJ
May touches Roy's shoes and checks eyes with mother
Roy's shoes are blue sneakers , May is also wearing blue sneakers . May touches Roy's shoes again .
May is fascinated by Roy's watch , she kisses it
mother goes to the toybox , May walks towards her with excited noises .
May gets her bottle from the bookshelf
this is May's label for her bottle
May stands by her mother drinking from the bottle
baby is a call May uses to attract atttention .
May hugs the monkey but continues to drink the milk herself
May walks to her father , gets the book and takes it to her mother
mother places the doll on the bookshelf
May examines a toy frog May drops the baby and continues to drink
May looks at a book and continues to drink her milk
May looks at her mother , mother plays with a toy phone
May sits by her mother and they look at a book
points to a picture in the book
points to picture in the book again
points to a picture in the book
mother waves her hand through the air like a plane flying . May repeats the action but not the sound
no response , mother plays with the toy frog , making it jump , May watches
May looks towards her father who is in the kitchen area
May points to the picture in the book
May points to the baby in the book
May turns the pages in the book and points
May turns several pages in the book
May points and then touches the picture
May checks eyes with her mother
they both look towards the toybox
May goes to get the book
May returns with a set of stacking rings
May removes the first ring from the stack and tries to slip it over her arm
May hands the ring to her mother
May puts all the rings on her arms and then flaps her arms
May removes all the rings from her arms and hands them to her mother
mother takes the rings one by one and puts them on the monkey's arm May tries unsuccessfully to remove a ring from the monkey , she pulls the arm towards her mother
May hands the rings to her mother
May slaps the book , slaps it from her mother's hand and makes complaining noises
May hands her mother another book , still animals
mother points to the book in the toybox , May looks
mother points to the book she's holding
May sees her bottle on the bookshelf and climbs up to get it
mother claps the monkey's arms in time with her singing
May stands and walks to her mother
points to the shoes that May is wearing
mother touches CJ's shoes again , no response
May sits and looks at her mother
May makes piercing shrieks of complaint
May crawls into the kitchen , mother retrieves her .
